name: find joy in the journey ebook
description:
how 12 women could face tomorrow just because He lives

--------------------------------------
compiled by Erin Vick Franklin
designed by Mary Jo Smith

Leave your email address in the "Instructions to Merchant" upon checkout and I will email you a PDF of the book. Be sure to use the code NOSHIPPINGEBOOK upon checkout since the product will be emailed to you. Otherwise you will be charged $6.00 for shipping!

Go to www.findjoyinthejourneybook.com for a description of the book as well as a free "find joy in the journey" printable. You can also sign up to be an affiliate there.

"Because of the Lord's great love we are not consumed, for His compassions never fail. They are new every morning; great is your faithfulness." {Lamentations 3:22-23}

name: Worthy of the Prize Sports Camps Manual
description:
A Church's Guide to Implementing an Effective, Community-Reaching Christian Sports Camp

*******************************
Erin Vick Franklin

Foreword by Jim Sundberg, 1985 World Champion Kansas City Royal, Winner of 6 Gold Gloves

*******************************
Order one for your church or mission organization and I will autograph your copy!

Don't have a church or mission organization to buy for? Purchase a copy and I will send it to the church/mission organization of my choice, in your name! Just let me know in the "Instructions to Merchant" upon checkout that this is what you want to do.

***Please allow a 2 week turnaround time on this product!
